nodes.text: Tibor was a male Kadas'sa'Nikto working for Lokaibus the Hutt living during the Galactic War. In 3637 BBY a shipment of beast delivered to the Hutt's Slavering Arenas was hijacked by the Nova Blades pirates above Rishi and Tibor was tasked with retrieving them.
Tibor appears in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, released on December 2, 2014.
